item.title: BCS
item.description: score:-56 Chances: Barclays’ appointment of James Edmonds as Global Head of Sustainable Project Finance demonstrates commitment to sustainability. Europe’s biggest banks announcing new share buybacks worth $5 billion could benefit Barclays’ market position. Barclays’ dividend payment announcement reflects its commitment to shareholder value.
